results.title: Down to Sussex
results.creator_credit: Kenneth J. Fairbairn, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films
results.brief_description: South Down and Weald - open space and green woodland. This is Sussex, a county rich in scenic beauty. History shows itself everywhere, right back to the threshold of legend - The Long Man of Wilmington and Chanctonbury Ring. All this the present day traveller can see and enjoy, together with the present day delights of Petworth Show, Goodwood Races, polo at Cowdray Park, Glyndebourne and the Sussex Coast. Narrated by Peter Halliday.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kenneth J. Fairbairn, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films

results.title: Down to earth city living
results.brief_description: Depicts the alternative energy sources used at the Integral Urban House in Berkeley, California to transform a typical urban residence into an almost self-sufficient habitat. Shows how solar energy is integrated into the house to provide economical and efficient heating; how the roof and backyard are utilised optimally to furnish the dwellers with a year round supply of vegetables; and how organic waste is recycled and transformed into plant nutrients for use in the garden. Suitable for lower secondary level.

results.title: Down to earth
results.creator_credit: David Morgan, Kestrel Films (Australia) and Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works
results.brief_description: Shows how a large city such as Melbourne disposes of its enormous amount of waste water every day. Looks at the processes involved in sewage treatment and in particular, the work carried out at the Werribee Sewage Treatment Farm. Narrated by Charles Tingwell. Suitable for lower secondary level.

results.title: Down to earth
results.creator_credit: Eady-Barnes Productions and Training Films International
results.brief_description: The film portrays “lucky” Joe, an electrician, in several hazardous situations, each potentially lethal. Joe’s enthusiasm for providing power and tools to whoever should require them, or to do electrical repair work himself, is not equalled by his observance of the strict site safety rules with the result that he puts many others as well as himself into considerable danger.

results.title: Down there = alli abajo (Spanish version)
results.brief_description: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. Presents information about reproduction, preventative health care and contraception.

results.title: Down There (Serbian Version)
results.brief_description: A program about women’s bodies - reproduction, preventative health care and contraception. Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, it breaks down the myths, dispels the fears and misinformation by presenting easy-to-understand information about women’s bodies and how they work.
